guild_id.description: guild id of the command, if not global

name_localizations.type: dictionary with keys in available locales
name_localizations.description: Localization dictionary for name field. Values follow the same restrictions as name

description.description: Description for CHAT_INPUT commands, 1-100 characters. Empty string for USER and MESSAGE commands

description_localizations.type: dictionary with keys in available locales
description_localizations.description: Localization dictionary for description field. Values follow the same restrictions as description

options.description: Parameters for the command, max of 25

default_member_permissions.description: Set of permissions represented as a bit set

dm_permission.description: Indicates whether the command is available in DMs with the app, only for globally-scoped commands. By default, commands are visible.

default_permission.description: Not recommended for use as field will soon be deprecated. Indicates whether the command is enabled by default when the app is added to a guild, defaults to true

version.description: Autoincrementing version identifier updated during substantial record changes

type.type: one of application command option type

name_localizations.type: dictionary with keys in available locales
name_localizations.description: Localization dictionary for the name field. Values follow the same restrictions as name

description_localizations.type: dictionary with keys in available locales
description_localizations.description: Localization dictionary for the description field. Values follow the same restrictions as description

required.description: If the parameter is required or optional--default false

choices.type: array of application command option choice
choices.description: Choices for STRING, INTEGER, and NUMBER types for the user to pick from, max 25

options.description: If the option is a subcommand or subcommand group type, these nested options will be the parameters

channel_types.description: If the option is a channel type, the channels shown will be restricted to these types

min_value.type: integer for INTEGER options, double for NUMBER options
min_value.description: If the option is an INTEGER or NUMBER type, the minimum value permitted

max_value.type: integer for INTEGER options, double for NUMBER options
max_value.description: If the option is an INTEGER or NUMBER type, the maximum value permitted

min_length.description: For option type STRING, the minimum allowed length (minimum of 0, maximum of 6000)

max_length.description: For option type STRING, the maximum allowed length (minimum of 1, maximum of 6000)

autocomplete.description: If autocomplete interactions are enabled for this STRING, INTEGER, or NUMBER type option

name_localizations.type: dictionary with keys in available locales
name_localizations.description: Localization dictionary for the name field. Values follow the same restrictions as name

value.description: Value for the choice, up to 100 characters if string

type.description: Value of application command option type

value.description: Value of the option resulting from user input

options.type: array of application command interaction data option
options.description: Present if this option is a group or subcommand

focused.description: true if this option is the currently focused option for autocomplete

id.description: ID of the command or the application ID

application_id.description: ID of the application the command belongs to

permissions.description: Permissions for the command in the guild, max of 100

id.description: ID of the role, user, or channel. It can also be a permission constant

permission.description: true to allow, false, to disallow
